title: AllianzGI Diversified Income & Convertible Fund (ACV) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: AllianzGI Diversified Income & Convertible Fund ( ACV  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.167 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased ACV prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 18th quarter that ACV has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $23.5, the dividend yield is 8.53%.
The previous trading day's last sale of ACV was $23.5, representing a -7.15% decrease from the 52 week high of $25.31 and a 34.21% increase over the 52 week low of $17.51.
ACV's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $1.7.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the ACV Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
